description: This is a technical school. Here I have learned a lot of things from mechanics, electronics and even programming. This is a great place to start because I fell in love with embedded programming from here. Here I learned about hardware, how to process signals and design an application according to the requirements from reality.

The Open Lab is a Research Center of the University of Technology and Education Ho Chi Minh City (HCMUTE). The Institute has three main objectives: to promote fundamental research in Robotics and Applied Informatics, to cooperate with the community in industrial technological projects, and to offer scientific education through graduate courses.

Ban Vien Company Limited â€“ are Trusted Technology Partner in Software Development & Embedded System development, have been providing full scope of IT services for 10+ years in Automotive (Chip Driver Development), Education (K-12 LMS Platform, Professional e-Training Platform), e-Commerce (Customer Development & Sales Development) for FMCG industry, Banking & Finance, Insurance.

Ban Vien provides Automotive Embedded Services to build solutions for global leaders in micro-controller, analogue, power and SoC products. With skilled professionals and decades of experience, we also provide end-to-end services with New Product Development, Product Enhancement, Sustenance, Testing and Verification.

At here I am in charge of the main job is integration, unit test and verify for automotive source. I have worked to develop the driver for IoT devices, check and detect errors.

Bosch, a global leader in technology and services, employs hundreds of thousands of associates worldwide.With core operations in mobility solutions, industrial technology, consumer goods, and energy and building technology, Bosch offers a vast range of products and services. They're a major player in the automotive industry, supplying components and systems for various vehicles. Bosch is also known for high-quality consumer goods like appliances and power tools, and is at the forefront of developing connected and smart technologies for homes, factories, and even self-driving cars.

I work for a department specializing in power steering. In general, an important part of a good car is the control system. Our task is to meet customer requirements and make it even better, and safety is also very important, always like that. Here I am responsible for almost all stages from design, to code creation and even testing at different levels.
